step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed and focus on the circular motion.
Nicely done. Try to bring your shoulder blades together as you roll them back and down.
Great job completing the first set! Remember to breathe deeply as you roll your shoulders back.
Excellent second set beginning. Focus on a smooth, controlled movement.
You're doing well. Ensure the motion is a full circle, not just up and down.
Fantastic finish! You've successfully completed the shoulder rolls, improving mobility and lymphatic flow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Breathing deeply while rolling back helps improve oxygen flow. Keep up the excellent work on regaining shoulder mobility!
